definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: This course of action is advisable.
sentences.chinese: 这当然是一厢情愿的海市蜃楼。

sentences.english: I love you just wishful thinking began as stop-motion.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你只是一厢情愿一开始就成为定格。
但那只是一厢情愿的想法。

sentences.english: The so-called love, just we wishful thinking.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的爱情，只不过是我们一厢情愿。

sentences.english: Look to reality instead of relying on wishful thinking.
sentences.chinese: 要着眼现实，而不要依赖一厢情愿的想法。

sentences.english: But this seems mostly to be wishful thinking.
sentences.chinese: 但这看来更多的只是一厢情愿的想法。

sentences.english: There's a lot of this going around in emerging markets.
sentences.chinese: 这种一厢情愿目前在新兴市场很流行。

sentences.english: They cede power with the belief, however wishful, they will be better off.
sentences.chinese: 他们放弃权利，一厢情愿地相信自己会过得好。

sentences.english: Aufhebung is one of philosophy's pretty little dreams.
sentences.chinese: 在哲学上，只是一厢情愿的美梦。

sentences.english: Sometimes, wishful thinking or self-assertion is in bring trouble on oneself.
sentences.chinese: 有时候啊，一厢情愿或者自作多情都是在自寻烦恼。

sentences.english: The so-called miss, just a person's wishful thinking.
sentences.chinese: 所谓思念，只是一个人的一厢情愿。

sentences.english: This, of course, is a fond delusion.
sentences.chinese: 这当然是一厢情愿的海市蜃楼。

sentences.english: Many friendship or real love are broken by wishful thinking on my part .
sentences.chinese: 很多感情，都因为一厢情愿最后连朋友都当不成了。

sentences.english: I learnt a lesson from this, after that it was better not to make decision just by one party.
sentences.chinese: 这事令我上了一课，以后做事还是不要一厢情愿的好。

sentences.english: Some of those are only one-sided wishful thinking.
sentences.chinese: 有些是一厢情愿的自欺欺人。

definition: to imagine that one's love is reciprocated/to shower affection on an uninterested party
to deceive others and to deceive oneself/to believe one's own lies
to believe oneself infallible (idiom)/to be opinionated
both sides are willing/by mutual consent
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
man of Qǐ fears the sky falling (idiom); groundless fears
lit. the falling flowers are yearning for love, but the heartless brook ripples on (idiom)/fig. one side is willing, yet the other one remains indifferent (usually of unrequited love)
pinyin: luo4 hua1 you3 yi4 , liu2 shui3 wu2 qing2

definition: (of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
